channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia CEO says AI boom will create 'six-figure' construction jobs
item.description: Jensen Huang calls AI infrastructure development the "largest buildout in human history," creating massive job opportunities and wage growth for skill...

item.title: How Plug-In Solar Lets Everyone Enjoy Solar Savings
item.description: Although solar can save consumers a lot of money, many people find it hard to invest if they do not have a good roof or enough capital. Plug-in solar ...

item.title: Fosi Audio Introduces A Powerful 2.1 Bluetooth Amplifier For High-Fidelity Listening
item.description: The new BT20A MAX mini amplifier is the flagship version of the company's BT20A series of amplifiers and includes advanced Bluetooth, and refined soun...

item.title: FDA upgrades cookie recall to highest danger level over undeclared peanuts
item.description: The FDA upgraded the Gregory's Foods cookie dough recall to its most serious risk category over the potential presence of undeclared peanuts.

item.title: ‘Return To Silent Hill’ Not Welcome By Rotten Tomatoes Critics
item.description: "Return to Silent Hill," a horror thriller based on Konami’s hit 2001 video game "Silent Hill 2," is new in theaters. Find out what Rotten Tomatoes cr...

item.title: Trump cancels Puerto Rico solar project designed to help 30,000 low-income families in rural areas
item.description: Javier Rúa Jovet, public policy director for Puerto Rico’s Solar and Energy Storage Association, disputed the Trump rationale for the move.

item.title: As Winter Storm Fern barrels in, all eyes are on the Weather Channel. Its CEO is charting the company’s next big forecast: growth
item.description: CEO Rohit Agarwal says hype and scaremongering amid a dangerous storm are counter-productive when the company is building its business based on trust.

item.title: What To Watch This Weekend: New Shows And Movies To Stream On Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Apple TV And More
item.description: Looking for something new to stream this weekend? Here’s every major new movie and show hitting Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Apple TV and more.

item.description: Corporate credit cards may seem mundane, but adding Brex to Capital One’s credit card platform, which now includes Discover, and applying its technolo...

item.title: Michelle Obama says friendships are as important as college degrees, job titles, and salary: ‘You’ve got to be really smart and selective about who you let in’
item.description: The former first lady says it’s important to make new friends, but advises people to be picky about who they let stick around. Longtime duos, like Opr...

item.title: Trump says he's 'not a huge fan' of 401(k) withdrawal plan for homebuyers' down payments
item.description: Trump says he's "not a huge fan" of letting homebuyers tap 401(k) retirement accounts for down payments, citing strong account performance amid market...

item.title: IMF chief sees global GDP growth as ‘beautiful but not enough’ to handle ‘the debt that is hanging around our necks’
item.description: Governments need to take care of “those who are falling off the wagon," Kristalina Georgieva said on a panel discussion in Davos.

item.title: The U.S. has ‘escalation dominance’ in a debt war: Europe would face a violent market crash if it dumps Treasuries
item.description: Europe accounts for about a third of U.S. government bonds held overseas, or roughly 10% of the overall Treasury market.

item.title: Dow falls as banks stocks struggle, while tech drives Nasdaq higher — live

item.title: Mortgage rates tick higher but remain near 3-year low

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
